title: tokens
description: List all tokens known to the node.

name.description: Token name. String for native Minima ('Minima'), object with name/url/description for custom tokens. NOTE: This field is 'name' in the tokens response, but 'token' in the balance response.

total.description: AGENT WARNING: Total supply of this token (STRING). For Minima this is ~1B. NOT wallet balance.

decimals.description: Number of decimal places (INTEGER, not string)

script.description: Token script (usually 'RETURN TRUE'). Only present for custom tokens.

coinid.description: Coin ID of the token creation transaction. Only present for custom tokens.

totalamount.description: Total amount in smallest unit (STRING). Only present for custom tokens.

x-agent-warnings: total here is token supply, consistent with balance.total — NOT wallet balance
Token name field is 'name' here but 'token' in balance response — different field names!
For native Minima (0x00): only name, tokenid, total, decimals, scale are present
For custom tokens: also includes script, coinid, totalamount
decimals and scale are INTEGERS (not strings like most other numeric fields)
